title: N1 (10 bài)
headline: Giáo trình luyện thi năng lực tiếng Nhật N1
objectives_summary: Nắm được Từ vựng, Ngữ pháp, Đọc hiểu tương đương với trình độ N1 của Kỳ thi năng lực tiếng Nhật.
Hiểu được tiếng Nhật được sử dụng trong cuộc sống hằng ngày.
Hiểu được nội dung của các đoạn văn có tính lý luận như bài báo- thuyết giảng trên tạp chí, báo chí, những bình luận đơn giản,…

title: N2 (10 bài)
headline: Tài liệu luyện thi kỳ thi năng lực Nhật ngữ JLPT N2.
objectives_summary: Nắm được từ vựng, ngữ pháp, đọc hiểu tương đương với cấp độ N2 củ kỳ thi năng lực Nhật ngữ.
Có thể hiểu, lý giải được hầu hết tiếng Nhật được sử dụng trong các ngữ cảnh trong cuộc sống hàng ngày.
Có thể đọc và lý giải được các đoạn văn có lập luận rõ ràng như các bài ký sự, giải thích, các bình luận đơn giản của báo chí và tạp chí.

title: N5 (15 bài)
headline: KHóa học cho kỳ thi Năng lực Nhật ngữ cấp độ N5 dành cho người nước ngoài (15 bài)
objectives_summary: Nắm được những điều cơ bản như cách viết , cách phát âm từ vựng trong tiếng Nhật.
Nắm được Từ vựng, cách diễn đạt, ngữ pháp tương đương với cấp độ N5 của kỳ thi Năng lực Nhật ngữ.
Có thể chào hỏi cơ bản sử dụng trong đời sống hàng ngày

title: N4 (15 bài)
headline: Khóa học N4 cho kỳ thi Năng lực Nhật ngữ dành cho người nước ngoài (15 bài)
objectives_summary: Nắm được Từ vựng, cách diễn đạt, ngữ pháp tương đương với cấp độ N4 của kỳ thi Năng lực Nhật ngữ.
Có thể hiểu được hầu hết nội dung của các đoạn hội thoại trong cuộc sống hàng ngàu nếu được nói một cách chậm rãi
Có thể đọc và hiểu được các câu và đoạn văn cố định được viết bằng Kanji của cáp độ N4.

title: Complete Japanese Course: Learn Japanese for Beginners
headline: Learn Japanese FAST with this non-stop Japanese speaking course for BEGINNERS: learning Japanese will be easy and fun!
objectives_summary: 500+ most useful vocabulary words
Top most useful phrases you can use in everyday situations
Proper Japanese pronunciation

title: Online Japanese N5 Course(All 15 lessons)
headline: 日本語能力試験N5対応教材 (JLPT N5 Level Elementary Japanese Study Course)
objectives_summary: Master the basics of writing and pronunciation of Japanese vocabulary.
Master vocabulary, expressions, and grammar related to the JLPT N5 level.
Being able to use basic greetings often used in daily life.

title: Japanese Course for Absolute Beginners (Letters, Alphabet)
headline: Elementary Japanese for non-Japanese Beginner Course Hiragana + Katakana + Basic Conversation
objectives_summary: Master Japanese characters: Hiragana and Katakana system
Totally understand Japanese writing system
Acquire a strong foundation to start elementary Japanese

title: Online Japanese N4 Course(All 15 lessons)
headline: 日本語能力試験N4対応教材 (JLPT N4 Level Elementary Japanese Study Course)
objectives_summary: Master vocabulary, expressions, and grammar related to the JLPT N4 level.
Be able to comprehend contents slowly spoken in daily life conversations.
Be able to comprehend and read typical phrases and sentences written in N4 level kanji.

title: Online Japanese Beginner Course (All 12 lessons）
headline: [日本語ひらがな・カタカナ・会話]Elementary Japanese for non-Japanese Beginner Course Hiragana + Katakana + Conversation (All 12 lesson)
objectives_summary: Master writing and pronunciation of Japanese hiragana
Master writing and pronunciation of Japanese katakana
Master Japanese voiced sounds and the p-sound

title: Japanese In Context - Elementary Japanese Course
headline: Learn to to speak, read, and write authentic - and practical Japanese to boost your career or just enrich your life
objectives_summary: 61 lectures with over 5 hours of content!
49 video demonstrations of how to write Japanese characters with over 2 hours of content by a native speaker!
58 activities with vocabulary and grammar to test your writing and reading skills

title: Online Japanese N3 Course(All 10 lessons)
headline: 日本語能力試験N3対応教材 (JLPT N3 Level Intermediate Japanese Study Course)
objectives_summary: Master vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension related to the JLPT N3 level.
Be able to comprehend contents spoken in almost natural speed in daily life conversations.
Be able to comprehend and read everyday topics, slightly complex Japanese sentences, newspaper headlines

title: Japanese language course: MISJ NOVICE PROGRAM LEVEL 1
headline: Go beyond the MISJ WELCOME PROGRAM in the most efficient, effective, and enjoyable way
objectives_summary: ・Finish learning ひらがな & カタカナ reading and writing, and start learning かんじ
・Review and expand the topics of conversation introduced in the WELCOME PROGRAM, such as greetings and talking about places, things, and yourself & family.
・New topics of conversation include inviting someone to join you, honorific questions, talking about schedule and existence.

title: Japanese In Context - Elementary Japanese Course
headline: Learn to to speak, read, and write authentic - and practical Japanese to boost your career or just enrich your life
objectives_summary: 61 lectures with over 5 hours of content!
49 video demonstrations of how to write Japanese characters with over 2 hours of content by a native speaker!
58 activities with vocabulary and grammar to test your writing and reading skills

title: Japanese - KanaBeats - Hiragana and Katakana
headline: An innovative and rhythmic approach to learning the phonetic writing systems of hiragana and katakana.
objectives_summary: learn to write all 46 hiragana from memory with correct stroke order
learn to write all 46 katakana from memory with correct stroke order
learn all the phonemes that derive from the base 46 sounds

title: Japanese for total beginners
headline: Japanese for beginners, travelers, and students. The teacher is a native speaker!!
objectives_summary: Understanding of basic structure of Japanese language
Words and phrases useful and nessesary for traveling
Get familiar to Japanese culture and people's behavior

title: Japanese in 14 Weeks with Scientific Memorization Method-
headline: In 14 weeks, you will be able to speak Japanese!
objectives_summary: Adapt a very scientific memorization method, so once you learn it, it will be stored in your long-term memory.
Students who complete this course will be able to live or travel in Japan by speaking Japanese.
The lessons will teach the students Japanese phrases that are very pragmatic in ordinary life, therefore, will not be centered on grammar.

title: Online Japanese Beginner Course (All 12 lessons）
headline: [日本語ひらがな・カタカナ・会話]Elementary Japanese for non-Japanese Beginner Course Hiragana + Katakana + Conversation (All 12 lesson)
objectives_summary: Master writing and pronunciation of Japanese hiragana
Master writing and pronunciation of Japanese katakana
Master Japanese voiced sounds and the p-sound

title: Online Japanese N5 Kanji Character Course（All 9 lessons）
headline: 日本語能力試験N5漢字対応教材 (JLPT N5 Level Kanji Character Study Course)
objectives_summary: Understand the origins of Kanji
Correctly write Japanese kanji
Master the Japanese readings and phonetic readings of kanji

title: Online Japanese N4 Course(All 15 lessons)
headline: 日本語能力試験N4対応教材 (JLPT N4 Level Elementary Japanese Study Course)
objectives_summary: Master vocabulary, expressions, and grammar related to the JLPT N4 level.
Be able to comprehend contents slowly spoken in daily life conversations.
Be able to comprehend and read typical phrases and sentences written in N4 level kanji.

title: Japanese conversation for English speakers < lesson + quiz >
headline: A a fun, clear and practical way for English speakers to master Japanese conversation.
objectives_summary: Understand the basic differences between English and Japanese
Engage in simple Japanese conversations
Understand basic Japanese nouns, adjectives, adverbs, verbs and grammar

title: Comprehensive Essential Japanese for Beginners
headline: Anime, Japan, Dating  - How to make all of this comfortably possible as many of my students did
objectives_summary: Introduce themselves properly
Ask where somebody is from and how to answer
Ask someone's name without offending them

title: Online Japanese N3 Course(All 10 lessons)
headline: 日本語能力試験N3対応教材 (JLPT N3 Level Intermediate Japanese Study Course)
objectives_summary: Master vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension related to the JLPT N3 level.
Be able to comprehend contents spoken in almost natural speed in daily life conversations.
Be able to comprehend and read everyday topics, slightly complex Japanese sentences, newspaper headlines

title: Comprehensive Casual Japanese For Beginners
headline: Speak natural sounding casual Japanese with confidence
objectives_summary: understand the basics of casual Japanese
speak naturally with their Japanese friends
confidently invite their Japanese friends to hang out

title: Japanese conversation for English speakers 2 <lesson + quiz>
headline: A fun, clear and practical way for English speakers to master Japanese conversation
objectives_summary: Understand the basic differences between English and Japanese
Engage in simple Japanese conversations
Understand 4 basic forms of verbs
